name: Yang, Ingwersen et al. 2017
description: The peer-review manuscript describing the USEEIO model.
textReference: Yang, Y., Ingwersen, W.W., Hawkins, T.R., Srocka, M., Meyer, D.E., 2017. USEEIO: A New and Transparent United States Environmentally-Extended Input-Output Model. Journal of Cleaner Production.
